name.japanese: フォクシー海賊船・格闘場

description: The combat arena aboard Foxy's ship where the Captain's Fight of the Davy Back Fight takes place. The arena is filled with traps, trapdoors, and hidden mechanisms designed to give Foxy the advantage.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Survives Face Bombs
keyEvents.description: The combat arena is where Luffy first survives Foxy's Face Bombs using his rubber body's resistance.

keyEvents.title: Trapdoor Ocean Trap
keyEvents.description: Foxy activates a trapdoor in the arena floor that opens to the ocean below, nearly causing Luffy to fall in.

notableFeatures: Hidden wooden replicas for disguise tricks

name.japanese: フォクシー海賊船・内部罠部屋

description: The interior rooms of Foxy's ship designed specifically to trap and defeat opponents in the Combat round. Features spike traps, locked rooms, and contains weapons like cannons.

keyEvents.title: Spike Trap Room
keyEvents.description: Foxy locks Luffy in a room where the floor outside is rigged with lethal spikes, creating a trap where breaking out would normally mean falling onto spikes.

keyEvents.title: Cannon Escape
keyEvents.description: Luffy discovers a cannon in the locked room and uses it to blast through the door while avoiding the spike trap.

name.japanese: フォクシー海賊船・鏡の部屋

description: A special chamber within Foxy's ship with walls covered entirely in mirrors. This room is designed specifically to maximize the effectiveness of Foxy's Noro Noro no Mi powers by allowing his slow beams to reflect infinitely. Also houses the Gorilla Puncher 13.

keyEvents.title: Noro Marble Oni Coach
keyEvents.description: Foxy brings Luffy to the mirror room and uses his Mirror Racket to create his ultimate technique, bouncing Noro Noro Beams in all directions.

keyEvents.title: Gorilla Puncher 13 Activation
keyEvents.description: Foxy activates the Gorilla Puncher 13 mechanical weapon in this room, combining it with his reflected slow beams.

notableFeatures: Designed to reflect Noro Noro Beams infinitely
Strategic chamber for maximizing Devil Fruit effectiveness
